author: Ivan Akimov <ivan@barreleye.com> (https://twitter.com/IvanAkimov)
name: hashids
description: Generate YouTube-like ids from numbers. Use Hashids when you do not want to expose your database ids to the user.

scripts.coverage: nyc npm test && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls
scripts.minify: cd dist && uglifyjs hashids.js -o hashids.min.js --source-map hashids.min.map --compress --mangle
scripts.build: npm run test && npm run build:node && npm run rename:global && npm run minify
scripts.all: npm run lint && npm run coverage && npm run build && npm run clean
